actions.caption: Migrate your code to use the latest FarmBeats API version
actions.description: Migrate your code to use the latest FarmBeats API version

detailedDescription: We identified calls to an ADMA API version that is scheduled for deprecation. To ensure uninterrupted access to ADMA, latest features, and performance improvements, switch to the latest ADMA API version.

exposedMetadataProperties.Tip: Upgrade to the latest FarmBeats API version

label: Upgrade to the latest API version
potentialBenefits: Ensure uninterrupted access to FarmBeats

actions.caption: Update Flux Configuration Deployments
actions.description: Update Flux Configuration Deployments

detailedDescription: The Microsoft Flux extension frequently receives updates for security and stability. The upcoming update, in line with the OSS Flux Project, will modify the HelmRelease and HelmChart APIs by removing deprecated fields. To avoid disruption to your workloads, necessary action is needed.
displayName: Upcoming Breaking Changes for Microsoft Flux Extension
label: Upcoming Breaking Changes for Microsoft Flux Extension
potentialBenefits: Improved stability, security, and new functionality

actions.caption: View to learn more about recommended action
actions.description: View to learn more about recommended action

actions.caption: View {language} SDK {version} release notes
actions.description: View {language} SDK {version} release notes

actions.caption: Update your code to use the latest REST API version

potentialBenefits: Our new API versions contain the latest and greatest features and capabilities.

actions.caption: Supported and unsupported features of MongoDB version 4.0
actions.description: Supported and unsupported features of MongoDB version 4.0

detailedDescription: Some of your applications are connecting to your upgraded Azure Cosmos DB's API for MongoDB account using the legacy 3.2 endpoint - [accountname].documents.azure.com. Use the new endpoint - [accountname].mongo.cosmos.azure.com (or its equivalent in sovereign, government, or restricted clouds).
displayName: Use the new 3.6+ endpoint to connect to your upgraded Azure Cosmos DB's API for MongoDB account
label: Use the new 3.6+ endpoint to connect to your upgraded Azure Cosmos DB's API for MongoDB account
potentialBenefits: Take advantage of the latest features in version 3.6+ of Azure Cosmos DB's API for MongoDB

actions.caption: CloudServicesRetirement
actions.description: CloudServicesRetirement

detailedDescription: Cloud Services (classic) is retiring. To avoid any loss of data or business continuity, migrate off before 31 Aug 2024.
displayName: Migrate off Cloud Services (classic) before 31 August 2024
label: Cloud Services (classic) is retiring. Migrate off before 31 Aug 2024
potentialBenefits: Continuity of your service

actions.caption: Keep your clusters up to date
actions.description: Keep your clusters up to date

detailedDescription: A cluster created one year ago does not have the latest image upgrades. Your cluster was created 1 year ago. As part of the best practices, we recommend you use the latest HDInsight images for the best open source updates, Azure updates, and security fixes. The recommended maximum duration for cluster upgrades is less than six months.
displayName: Upgrade your cluster to the the latest HDInsight image
label: Upgrade your cluster to the the latest HDInsight image
potentialBenefits: Get the latest fixes and features

actions.caption: Latest agent version of Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes
actions.description: Latest agent version of Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes

label: Upgrade to the latest agent version of Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes
potentialBenefits: Arc-enabled K8s latest agent version

actions.caption: Upgrade your VM to alternative image version
actions.description: Upgrade your VM to alternative image version

detailedDescription: Virtual Machines (VMs) in your subscription are running on images scheduled for deprecation. Once the image is deprecated, new VMs can't be created from the deprecated image. To prevent disruption to your workloads, upgrade to a newer image. (VMRunningDeprecatedImage)
displayName: Upgrade your deprecated Virtual Machine image to a newer image
label: Upgrade your VM to alternative image version
potentialBenefits: Minimize any potential disruptions to your VM workloads

actions.caption: Upgrade your VM to alternative image offer
actions.description: Upgrade your VM to alternative image offer

detailedDescription: Virtual Machines (VMs) in your subscription are running on images scheduled for deprecation. Once the image is deprecated, new VMs can't be created from the deprecated image.  To prevent disruption to your workloads, upgrade to a newer image. (VMRunningDeprecatedOfferLevelImage)
displayName: Upgrade to a newer offer of Virtual Machine image
label: Upgrade to a newer offer of Virtual Machine image
potentialBenefits: Minimize any potential disruptions to your VM workloads

actions.caption: Upgrade your VM to alternative image plan
actions.description: Upgrade your VM to alternative image plan

detailedDescription: Virtual Machines (VMs) in your subscription are running on images scheduled for deprecation. Once the image is deprecated, new VMs can't be created from the deprecated image.  To prevent disruption to your workloads, upgrade to a newer image.
displayName: Upgrade to a newer SKU of Virtual Machine image
label: Upgrade to a newer SKU of Virtual Machine image
potentialBenefits: Minimize any potential disruptions to your VM workloads

actions.caption: Upgrade to Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2
actions.description: Upgrade to Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2

detailedDescription: Upgrade to Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 from TLS 1.0 or TLS 1.1 for the application. TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 were deprecated in March 2021.
displayName: Upgrade to Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2
label: Upgrade to Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2
potentialBenefits: Improved security. Compliance with newest standards.

resourceMetadata.plural: Azure Database for MySQL flexible servers
resourceMetadata.singular: Azure Database for MySQL flexible server

actions.caption: Use the newest version of the listQueryKeys request
actions.description: Use the newest version of the listQueryKeys request

detailedDescription: Upgrade to the newest version of the Search/searchServices/mysearchservice/listQueryKeys request. The platform identified resources under the subscription using an outdated version of the Search/searchServices/mysearchservice/listQueryKeys request.
displayName: Upgrade to the newest version of the listQueryKeys request
label: Upgrade to the newest version of the listQueryKeys request
potentialBenefits: Improved security.

actions.caption: Upgrade to 2.6.14 version of the Async Java SDK v2
actions.description: Upgrade to 2.6.14 version of the Async Java SDK v2

detailedDescription: There's a critical bug in version 2.6.13 (and lower) of the Azure Cosmos DB Async Java SDK v2 causing errors when a Global logical sequence number (LSN) greater than the Max Integer value is reached. The error happens transparently to you by the service after a large volume of transactions occur in the lifetime of an Azure Cosmos DB container. Note: While this is a critical hotfix for the Async Java SDK v2, we still highly recommend you migrate to the [Java SDK v4](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/sql/sql-api-sdk-java-v4).
displayName: Hotfix - Upgrade to 2.6.14 version of the Async Java SDK v2 or to Java SDK v4
label: Upgrade to 2.6.14 version of the Async Java SDK v2 to avoid a critical issue or upgrade to Java SDK v4 as Async Java SDK v2 is being deprecated
potentialBenefits: If action isn’t taken, all create, read, update, and delete operations may begin to fail with NumberFormatException

actions.caption: Upgrade your {language} SDK
actions.description: Upgrade your {language} SDK

detailedDescription: An Azure Cosmos DB account using an old version of the SDK lacks the latest fixes and improvements. Your Azure Cosmos DB account is using an outdated version of the SDK. We recommend upgrading to the latest version for the latest fixes, performance improvements, and new feature capabilities.
displayName: Upgrade outdated Azure Cosmos DB SDK to the latest version
label: Upgrade your deprecated Azure Cosmos DB SDK to a supported version
potentialBenefits: Improved reliability, performance, and new feature capabilities

actions.caption: Upgrade your Azure Fluid Relay client library
actions.description: Upgrade your Azure Fluid Relay client library

detailedDescription: If the Azure Fluid Relay service is invoked with an old client library, it might cause application problems. To ensure your application remains operational, upgrade your Azure Fluid Relay client library to the latest version. Upgrading provides the most up-to-date functionality, and enhancements in performance and stability.
displayName: Azure Fluid Relay client library should be upgraded
label: Upgrade your Azure Fluid Relay client library
potentialBenefits: Improved reliability

actions.caption: Critical - Upgrade to the current recommended version of the Java SDK v4
actions.description: Critical - Upgrade to the current recommended version of the Java SDK v4

detailedDescription: There's a critical bug in version 4.15 and lower of the Azure Cosmos DB Java SDK v4 causing errors when a Global logical sequence number (LSN) greater than the Max Integer value is reached. This happens transparently to you by the service after a large volume of transactions occur in the lifetime of an Azure Cosmos DB container. Avoid this problem by upgrading to the current recommended version of the Java SDK v4
displayName: Critical issue - Upgrade to the current recommended version of the Java SDK v4
label: Upgrade to the current recommended version of the Java SDK v4 to avoid a critical issue
potentialBenefits: If action isn’t taken, all create, read, update, and delete operations may begin to fail with NumberFormatException

actions.caption: Azure HDInsight release notes
actions.description: Azure HDInsight release notes

detailedDescription: A cluster not using the latest image does not have the latest upgrades. Your cluster is not using the latest image. We recommend you use the latest versions of HDInsight images for the best of open source updates, Azure updates, and security fixes. HDInsight releases happen every 30 to 60 days.
displayName: Upgrade your HDInsight Cluster
label: Upgrade your HDInsight Cluster
potentialBenefits: Get the latest fixes and features

actions.caption: Use latest AGC API
actions.description: Use latest AGC API

detailedDescription: The version of Application Gateway for Containers was provisioned with a preview version and is not supported for production. Ensure you provision a new gateway using the latest API version.
displayName: Migrate to supported version of AGC
label: Migrate to supported version of AGC
potentialBenefits: Ensure supportability and resiliency for production workloads

actions.caption: Upgrade your cluster to newest image
actions.description: Upgrade your cluster to newest image

detailedDescription: Our records indicate that one or more of your clusters are using images dated February 2022 or older (image versions 2202xxxxxx or older). There is a potential reliability issue on HDInsight clusters that use images dated February 2022 or older. Consider rebuilding your clusters with newest image.
displayName: VM agent is 9.9.9.9. Upgrade the cluster.
label: VM agent is 9.9.9.9. Upgrade the cluster.
potentialBenefits: Improved Reliability in Scaling and Network connectivity

actions.caption: Upgrade your VMSS to alternative image version
actions.description: Upgrade your VMSS to alternative image version

detailedDescription: VMSS in your subscription are running on images that have been scheduled for deprecation. Once the image is deprecated, your VMSS workloads would no longer scale out. Upgrade to newer version of the image to prevent disruption to your workload.
displayName: Upgrade your VMSS to alternative image version
label: Upgrade your VMSS to alternative image version
potentialBenefits: Minimize any potential disruptions to your VMSS workloads

actions.caption: Migrate from Application Insights instrumentation keys to connection strings
actions.description: Migrate from Application Insights instrumentation keys to connection strings

detailedDescription: Technical support for instrumentation key based global ingestion in the Application Insights feature of Azure Monitor is retiring.
displayName: Instrumentation key based global ingestion is being retired
label: Instrumentation key based global ingestion is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions

actions.caption: Evaluate the other virtual machines option
actions.description: Evaluate the other virtual machines option

detailedDescription: To avoid any disruption to your service, we recommend that you change the VM sizing for your workloads from the current NCv3-series VMs to the newer VM series in the same NC product line.
displayName: Virtual machines in NCv3-series is being retired.
label: Virtual machines in NCv3-series is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachine' and  (tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize) in ('Standard_NC6s_v3','Standard_NC12s_v3','Standard_NC24s_v3')  or tostring(sku.name) in ('Standard_NC6s_v3','Standard_NC12s_v3','Standard_NC24s_v3')) | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Use TLS 1.2 or later
actions.description: Use TLS 1.2 or later

detailedDescription: Support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 ends on the retirement date.
displayName: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
label: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.eventgrid/domains' and tostring(properties['minimumTlsVersionAllowed']) in ('1.1','1.0') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Upgrade your PostgreSQL 11 database servers
actions.description: Upgrade your PostgreSQL 11 database servers

detailedDescription: Upgrade your PostgreSQL 11 database servers to version 13 or later
displayName: Support for  Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server version 11 is being retired.
label: Support for  Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server version 11 is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers' and properties.version == '11' | project subscriptionId, id

resourceMetadata.plural: Azure Database for PostgreSQL flexible servers
resourceMetadata.singular: Azure Database for PostgreSQL flexible server

actions.caption: Use TLS 1.2 or later
actions.description: Use TLS 1.2 or later

detailedDescription: Support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 ends on the retirement date.
displayName: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
label: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.eventgrid/namespaces' and tostring(properties['minimumTlsVersionAllowed']) in ('1.1','1.0') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Use TLS 1.2 or later
actions.description: Use TLS 1.2 or later

detailedDescription: Support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 ends on the retirement date.
displayName: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
label: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.eventgrid/partnernamespaces' and tostring(properties['minimumTlsVersionAllowed']) in ('1.1','1.0') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to Application Gateway V2
actions.description: Transition to Application Gateway V2

detailedDescription: The platform encourages you to make the switch to Application Gateway V2 to avoid potential disruptions.
displayName: Application Gateway V1 is being retired.
label: Application Gateway V1 is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationgateways' and properties.sku.tier in ('Standard','WAF') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Use TLS 1.2 or later
actions.description: Use TLS 1.2 or later

detailedDescription: Support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 ends on the retirement date.
displayName: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
label: Event Grid requires using TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.eventgrid/topics' and tostring(properties['minimumTlsVersionAllowed']) in ('1.1','1.0') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: The applications must use TLS 1.2 or later
actions.description: The applications must use TLS 1.2 or later

detailedDescription: Azure Cache for Redis is moving toward requiring the use of the TLS 1.2
displayName: Azure Cache for Redis requires TLS 1.2 or later
label: Azure Cache for Redis requires TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis' and properties['minimumTlsVersion'] in ('1.1','1.0') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to the selected replacement product
actions.description: Migrate to the selected replacement product

detailedDescription: Workloads running Standard_M192ids_v2 are deleted and associated application data is lost.
displayName: Standard_M192ids_v2 is being retired.
label: Standard_M192ids_v2 is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachine' and  (tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize) in ('Standard_M192ids_v2')  or tostring(sku.name) in ('Standard_M192ids_v2')) | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to the SMART on FHIR (Enhanced)
actions.description: Transition to the SMART on FHIR (Enhanced)

detailedDescription: Applications relying on SMART on FHIR proxy report errors in accessing the FHIR service after the retirement date.
displayName: SMART on FHIR proxy feature in Azure Health Data Services is being retired.
label: SMART on FHIR proxy feature in Azure Health Data Services is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.healthcareapis/workspaces/fhirservices' and properties.authenticationConfiguration.smartProxyEnabled == 'true' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to Application Gateway WAF v2 - WAF Policy
actions.description: Transition to Application Gateway WAF v2 - WAF Policy

detailedDescription: To continue using this service, switch to Application Gateway WAF v2 Policy before the retirement date.
displayName: Application Gateway Web Application Firewall v2 configuration is planned for retirement
label: Application Gateway Web Application Firewall v2 configuration is planned for retirement
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.network/applicationgateways' and properties['sku']['tier'] in ('WAF_v2') and isnotnull(properties['webApplicationFirewallConfiguration']) | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Create a Cognitive Service for Language resource
actions.description: Create a Cognitive Service for Language resource

detailedDescription: Beginning October 1, 2022, you aren't be able to create new QnA Maker resources or knowledge bases. All QnA Maker resources and knowledge bases created before that date are supported until the retirement date.
displayName: Azure QnAMaker is being retired.
label: Azure QnAMaker is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts' and kind == 'QnAMaker' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to Azure Front Door Standard or Premium
actions.description: Migrate to Azure Front Door Standard or Premium

detailedDescription: To avoid service disruptions, you need to migrate to Azure Front Door Standard or Premium
displayName: Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) is being retired.
label: Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.cdn/profiles' and sku contains 'Standard_Microsoft' and kind == 'cdn' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Update the minimum TLS version for the namespace
actions.description: Update the minimum TLS version for the namespace

detailedDescription: To enhance security and provide best-in-class encryption for your data, we require interactions with Azure services to be secured using Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 or later before the retirement date.
displayName: Service Bus requires using TLS 1.2 or later
label: Service Bus requires using TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces' and isnotempty(tostring(parse_json(properties).minimumTlsVersion)) and tostring(parse_json(properties).minimumTlsVersion) in ('1.0','1.1') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Gateways will be automatically migrated
actions.description: Gateways will be automatically migrated

detailedDescription: Due to the lack of redundancy, lower availability, and potential higher costs associated with other failover solution; the platform is transitioning all SKUs without availability zones to SKUs with availability zones.
displayName: VpnGw1-5 (Non-Availability Zones SKUs) is being retired.
label: VpnGw1-5 (Non-Availability Zones SKUs) is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways' and tostring(parse_json(properties)['sku']['name']) in ('VpnGw1','VpnGw2','VpnGw3','VpnGw4','VpnGw5') and tostring(parse_json(properties)['gatewayType']) contains 'Vpn' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Upgrade to Standard SKU public IP addresses
actions.description: Upgrade to Standard SKU public IP addresses

detailedDescription: If you have any Basic SKU public IP addresses deployed in Azure Cloud Services (extended support), those deployments aren't affected by this retirement and you don't need to take any action for them.
displayName: Basic SKU is being retired
label: Basic SKU is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses' and sku.name=~'Basic' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Configure TLS 1.2 protocol or higher
actions.description: Configure TLS 1.2 protocol or higher

detailedDescription: All Cosmos DB database accounts must use Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 or higher
displayName: Azure Cosmos DB requires using TLS 1.2 or later
label: Azure Cosmos DB requires using TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts' and (isempty(properties['minimalTlsVersion']) or  properties['minimalTlsVersion'] in ('Tls11','Tls')) | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to version 13 or higher on Flexible Server
actions.description: Migrate to version 13 or higher on Flexible Server

detailedDescription: Migrate your Azure Database for PostgreSQL Single Servers to version 13 or later on Flexible Server
displayName: Support for Azure Database for PostgreSQL Single Server Version 11 is being retired
label: Support for Azure Database for PostgreSQL Single Server Version 11 is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers' and properties.version == '11' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Upgrade the Apache Spark 3.3-based workloads
actions.description: Upgrade the Apache Spark 3.3-based workloads

detailedDescription: Azure Synapse runtime for Apache Spark 3.3 are retired and disabled.
displayName: Azure Synapse for Runtime for Apache Spark 3.3 is being retired.
label: Azure Synapse for Runtime for Apache Spark 3.3 is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions for the applications
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces/bigdatapools' and todouble(properties.sparkVersion) == 3.3 | extend workspaceId = tostring(split(id,'/')[8]) | join (resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces' and properties.adlaResourceId == '' | project workspaceId = name) on workspaceId| project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to Inbound NAT rule V2
actions.description: Migrate to Inbound NAT rule V2

detailedDescription: To avoid service disruptions, migrate to Inbound NAT rule V2.
displayName: Inbound NAT rule V1 in Azure Load Balancer is being retired
label: Inbound NAT rule V1 in Azure Load Balancer is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers' and sku.name  == 'Standard' | extend inboundNATRULES=todynamic(properties['inboundNatRules']) | mv-expand inboundNATRULES | extend NATRULES = iff(array_length(properties.inboundNatPools) != 0, 1, 0) | extend inboundNATRULES = iff(isnotempty(inboundNATRULES.properties.backendIPConfiguration) and array_length(properties.inboundNatPools) == 0, 1, 0) | where inboundNATRULES ==1 or NATRULES==1  | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server
actions.description: Migrate to Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server

detailedDescription: Use the migration tool to migrate to Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server
displayName: Azure Database for PostgreSQL Single Server is being retired.
label: Azure Database for PostgreSQL Single Server is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Upgrade to Standard Load Balancer
actions.description: Upgrade to Standard Load Balancer

detailedDescription: To keep the workloads appropriately distributed, you need to upgrade to Standard Load Balancer.
displayName: Azure Basic Load Balancer is being retired
label: Azure Basic Load Balancer is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/loadBalancers' | where sku.name == 'Basic' | project id, subscriptionId

actions.caption: Create a Cognitive Service for Language resource
actions.description: Create a Cognitive Service for Language resource

detailedDescription: You aren't able to create new Language Understanding (LUIS) resources. All Language Understanding resources created before the retirement date will be supported until the retirement date.
displayName: Language Understanding (LUIS) is being retired.
label: Language Understanding (LUIS) is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts' and kind contains 'LUIS' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to managed disks
actions.description: Migrate to managed disks

detailedDescription: Migrate your data from Azure unmanaged disk storage to managed disks
displayName: Azure unmanaged disks is being retired.
label: Azure unmanaged disks is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' and isempty(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.managedDisk) | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to Azure Monitor VM insights
actions.description: Migrate to Azure Monitor VM insights

detailedDescription: To monitor connections between servers, processes, inbound and outbound connection latency, and ports across any TCP-connected architecture, you need to migrate to Azure Monitor VM insights.
displayName: Migrate to Azure Monitor VM insights when Service Map is being retired.
label: Migrate to Azure Monitor VM insights when Service Map is being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions and use new capabilities
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions' and plan.product == 'OMSGallery/ServiceMap' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Update the TLS policy for the Application Gateway
actions.description: Update the TLS policy for the Application Gateway

detailedDescription: To align with Azure's ongoing security enhancements, all connections to Application Gateway must use Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 or later
displayName: Application Gateway requires use of TLS 1.2 or later
label: Application Gateway requires use of TLS 1.2 or later
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationgateways' and (properties['sslPolicy']['minProtocolVersion'] != 'TLSv1_2' and properties['sslPolicy']['minProtocolVersion'] != 'TLSv1_3' and  properties['sslPolicy']['policyName'] !contains '2022' and properties['sslPolicy']['policyName'] !contains '401S' and properties['defaultPredefinedSslPolicy'] !contains '2022') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to Standard network features
actions.description: Migrate to Standard network features

detailedDescription: An Azure NetApp Files volume using Basic network features is subject to an IP route limit of 1600. IP route limits aren't adjustable. To prevent the IP route limit, migrate volumes to Standard network features from Basic network features.
displayName: End of Support for increase to IP route limit for Basic network features
label: End of Support for increase to IP route limit for Basic network features
potentialBenefits: Increase the number of IP routes.
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == "microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts/capacitypools/volumes" | where properties['provisioningState'] has "Succeeded" or properties['provisioningState'] has "succeeded"|  where properties['networkFeatures'] has "Basic" | project id, subscriptionId

serviceRetirement.retirementFeatureName: Increase the number of IP routes.

actions.caption: Enable auto upgrade on your SHIR
actions.description: Enable auto upgrade on your SHIR

actions.caption: Download the latest Self-Hosted IR Version
actions.description: Download the latest Self-Hosted IR Version

detailedDescription: Auto-upgrade of Self-hosted Integration runtime has been disabled. Know that you are not getting the latest changes and bug fixes on the Self-Hosted Integration runtime. Review them to enable the SHIR auto upgrade
displayName: Enable auto upgrade on your SHIR
label: Enable auto upgrade on your SHIR
potentialBenefits: To get the latest changes and bug fixes on the Self-Hosted Integration runtime

actions.caption: Update Device Update for IoT Hub SDK to the latest version
actions.description: Update Device Update for IoT Hub SDK to the latest version

detailedDescription: When a Device Update for IoT Hub instance uses an outdated version of the SDK, it doesn't get the latest upgrades. Upgrade the Device Update for IoT Hub SDK to the latest version.
displayName: Upgrade the Azure Device Update for IoT Hub SDK to the latest version
label: Upgrade the Azure Device Update for IoT Hub SDK to the latest version
potentialBenefits: Ensure business continuity with supported SDK

actions.caption: Migrate
actions.description: Migrate

detailedDescription: We announced the deprecation of Application Gateway V1 on April 28, 2023. Starting from April 28, 2026, we are retiring Application Gateway v1 SKU. If you use Application Gateway V1 SKU, start planning your migration to V2 now.
displayName: Application Gateway v1 has been retired. Please migrate to Application Gateway v2.
label: Application Gateway v1 has been retired. Please migrate to Application Gateway v2.
potentialBenefits: Plan your migration to v2 now.
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == 'microsoft.network/applicationgateways' | where tolower(properties.sku.tier) in ('standard', 'waf') | project id,subscriptionId

actions.caption: Transition to the Notary Project ecosystem
actions.description: Transition to the Notary Project ecosystem

detailedDescription: With advancements in technology, Docker Content Trust (DCT) no longer meets the requirements of modern supply chain security for containers. As a result, DCT is being retired and no longer available in Container Registry.
displayName: Docker Content Trust (DCT) is retiring and no longer available in Container Registry
label: Docker Content Trust is retiring and no longer available in Container Registry
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries' | where properties['policies']['trustPolicy']['status'] == 'enabled' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate the workloads to the latest VM generation
actions.description: Migrate the workloads to the latest VM generation

detailedDescription: D, Ds, Dv2, Dsv2, and Ls series Azure Virtual Machines (VMs) is being retired. Be aware of changes to the Azure Virtual Machines billing because of this retirement.
displayName: D, Ds, Dv2, Dsv2, and Ls series Azure Virtual Machines (VMs) are being retired
label: D, Ds, Dv2, Dsv2, and Ls series Azure Virtual Machines (VMs) are being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where ['type'] == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' | where properties['hardwareProfile']['vmSize'] in ('Standard_L4s', 'Standard_L8s', 'Standard_L16s', 'Standard_L32s', 'Standard_DS1_v2', 'Standard_DS3_v2','Standard_DS14_v2','Standard_DS2_v2','Standard_DS13_v2','Standard_D1_v2','Standard_DS4_v2','Standard_D2_v2','Standard_DS5_v2','Standard_DS11_v2','Standard_D3_v2','Standard_D4_v2','Standard_D14_v2','Standard_DS12_v2','Standard_D11_v2','Standard_DS15_v2','Standard_D12_v2','Standard_D13_v2','Standard_DS12-2_v2','Standard_D5_v2','Standard_DS1','Standard_D15_v2','Standard_DS13-4_v2','Standard_D2','Standard_DS12-1_v2','Standard_DS11-1_v2','Standard_DS3','Standard_DS2','Standard_DS3_v2_Promo','Standard_DS2_v2_Promo','Standard_D1','Standard_D2_v2_Promo','Standard_DS14-8_v2','Standard_D4','Standard_DS13-2_v2','Standard_D3','Standard_DS5_v2_Promo','Standard_D4_v2_Promo','Standard_DS4_v2_Promo','Standard_DS4','Standard_DS14-4_v2','Standard_D3_v2_Promo','Standard_D5_v2_Promo') | project subscriptionId, id

serviceRetirement.retirementFeatureName: Dsv2, Dv2, Ls, Ds, and D series

actions.caption: Migrate to a Microsoft-registered VPN client for point-to-site connections with Microsoft Entra ID.
actions.description: Migrate to a Microsoft-registered VPN client for point-to-site connections with Microsoft Entra ID.

detailedDescription: To improve security, the platform only supports Microsoft-registered VPN clients for point-to-site connections with Microsoft Entra ID authentication.
displayName: Manual VPN clients for point-to-site connections with Entra ID authentication are being retired
label: Manual VPN clients for point-to-site connections with Entra ID authentication are retiring
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways' | where properties['vpnClientConfiguration']['vpnAuthenticationTypes'] contains  'AAD' | where isnotempty(properties['vpnClientConfiguration']['aadAudience']) | where properties['vpnClientConfiguration']['aadAudience'] == '41b23e61-6c1e-4545-b367-cd054e0ed4b4' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to a supported Azure Kubernetes Service on Azure Local
actions.description: Transition to a supported Azure Kubernetes Service on Azure Local

detailedDescription: Deploying, upgrading, and scaling Azure Kubernetes Service on Windows Server 2019 and Windows Server 2022 is blocked.
displayName: Azure Kubernetes Service on Windows Server 2019 and Windows Server 2022 is being retired
label: Azure Kubernetes Service on Windows Server 2019 and Windows Server 2022 is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == 'microsoft.kubernetes/connectedclusters' | where properties['distribution'] in ('aks_management','aks_workload') | where properties['infrastructure'] == 'azure_stack_hci' | where ['kind'] != ('ProvisionedCluster') | project subscriptionId, id

serviceRetirement.retirementFeatureName: Deployments on Windows Server 2019 and Windows Server 2022

actions.caption: Upgrade to Azure Container Networking Interface (CNI) overlay
actions.description: Upgrade to Azure Container Networking Interface (CNI) overlay

detailedDescription: After the retirement date, workloads running on kubenet networking for AKS aren't supported.
displayName: Kubenet networking for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) is being retired
label: Kubenet networking for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) is retiring
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters' | where properties.networkProfile.networkPlugin == 'kubenet' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to the sidecar container
actions.description: Transition to the sidecar container

detailedDescription: After the retirement date, unless migrated to sidecar containers, Docker Compose applications face disruptions resulting in errors for HTTP status code of 5xx.
displayName: The Docker Compose public preview feature is being retired
label: The Docker Compose public preview feature is being retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.web/sites' | extend Version=properties.siteProperties.properties | mv-expand Version | extend VersionName=tostring(Version.name), Versionvalue=tostring(Version.value) | where VersionName=='LinuxFxVersion' | where Versionvalue in ('COMPOSE') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to Virtual Machine Scale Sets
actions.description: Transition to Virtual Machine Scale Sets

detailedDescription: Migrating to Virtual Machine Scale Sets with Flexible orchestration enhances the scalability, flexibility, and reliability of the Azure deployments. After the retirement date, workloads running Cloud Services (extended support) are deleted and associated application data is lost.
displayName: Cloud Services (extended support) is being retired
label: Cloud Services (extended support) will be retired
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: Resources | where type == 'microsoft.compute/cloudservices' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to Azure Container Apps and Azure Kubernetes Service
actions.description: Transition to Azure Container Apps and Azure Kubernetes Service

detailedDescription: Azure Spring Apps is being retired, and the Azure Spring Apps instances are no longer accessible.
displayName: Azure Spring Apps, including Basic, Standard and Enterprise plans, are being retired
label: Azure Spring Apps, including Basic, Standard and Enterprise plans, are being retired.
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: Resources | where type == 'microsoft.appplatform/spring' | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Transition to Azure Machine Configuration
actions.description: Transition to Azure Machine Configuration

detailedDescription: After the retirement date, the Desired State Configuration Extension for Azure Virtual Machines isn't supported.
displayName: Desired State Configuration Extension for Azure Virtual Machines is being retired
label: Desired State Configuration Extension for Azure Virtual Machines is retiring
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: Resources | where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' | extend JoinID = toupper(id), OSName = tostring(properties.osProfile.computerName), OSType = tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType) | join kind=inner(Resources | where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions' | extend VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))), ExtensionName = tolower(name) | where ExtensionName == 'microsoft.powershell.dsc') on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Upgrade the application to Node 22 LTS
actions.description: Upgrade the application to Node 22 LTS

detailedDescription: Extended support for Node 20 LTS is ending. The apps hosted on App Service continue to run; but security updates are no longer available and the platform no longer provides customer service for Node 20 LTS.
displayName: Community support for Node 20 LTS is ending, so the platform is retiring support on App Service
label: Community support for Node 20 LTS is ending so we are retiring support on App Service
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.web/sites'  and ['kind'] !contains 'functionapp' | extend Version=properties.siteProperties.properties | mv-expand Version | extend VersionName=tostring(Version.name), Versionvalue=tostring(Version.value) | where VersionName=='LinuxFxVersion' | where Versionvalue in ('NODE|20-lts') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to Azure Front Door Standard or Premium
actions.description: Migrate to Azure Front Door Standard or Premium

actions.caption: Move existing managed certs to BYOC by August 15, 2025
actions.description: Move existing managed certs to BYOC by August 15, 2025

detailedDescription: Starting 15 August 2025, Azure CDN will no longer support - new domain onboarding, new profile creation or Switching from BYOC to managed certificates. Existing managed certificates will auto-renew by 15 August 2025, valid until April 14, 2026, after which managed certs will no longer be supported.
displayName: Switch from managed certificates to BYOC by August 15, 2025 or migrate to AFD Standard/Premium
label: Switch from managed certificates to BYOC by August 15, 2025 or migrate to AFD Standard/Premium
potentialBenefits: Avoid potential disruptions
